title: Linux logrotate Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the logrotate command in Linux, learn how to configure it for Apache web server logs, and customize the configuration for specific log files.

meta.title: Linux logrotate Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the logrotate command in Linux, learn how to configure it for Apache web server logs, and customize the configuration for specific log files.
meta.keywords: Linux, logrotate, log management, Apache, log rotation, system monitoring, system administration

verify.name: Verify logrotate version
verify.hint: The logrotate version installed on your system does not match the expected version of 3.18.1. Please ensure that you have the correct version installed.

steps.title: Configure Logrotate for Apache Web Server Logs

verify.name: Verify Apache log rotation
verify.hint: The Apache log files were not rotated correctly. Please ensure that the logrotate configuration for Apache is set up properly.

steps.title: Customize Logrotate Configuration for Specific Log Files

verify.name: Verify custom log rotation
verify.hint: The custom log files were not rotated correctly. Please ensure that the logrotate configuration for the custom log file is set up properly.
